sx.blah.discord.json.responses

Class MessageResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.json.responses.MessageResponse

  • public class MessageResponse
extends Object
    The generic response when either receiving, sending or editing messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MessageResponse.AttachmentResponse
      A representation of a file attachment
      static class  MessageResponse.EmbedResponse
      Represents embeded data
